website_summaries.verdict: A popular carpet cleaner that gets the job done. Concentrated formula is compatible with leading brand carpet cleaners.
pros: Dependable for straightforward cleaning jobs and carpet maintenance
Concentrate is powerful and cost efficient for multi-room use
cons: Manufacturer recommends pre-treating stains with a different product
Although many appreciate the fresh linen scent, it causes allergic reactions in others

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning white carpets and smells nice - does not leave the house smelling like chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Jessica George

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very concentrated
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to clean the carpets in our 2900 sq ft house. Made a visible difference with a Hoover carpet cleaning machine. I suspect you can save a bit on the product if you mix it 3 to 1 in the detergent tank. At full concentration, even though the machine mixes it with water, it makes the carpet foam and requires 4 extra sweeps with just water to get everything out of the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: A FIRST for me - both Hoover machine and this Cleaner - it WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This solution is the King of all carpet cleaning solution. I JUST used it on my basement carpet - the basement entry door area AND the gym area. Amazingly effective at cleaning that ole' tried dirt filled carpet. PLEASE, dilute this stuff cause it is WAY too strong and creates tons of foam IF use just as in the solution tank - I found that out the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Dsunfish2000

customer_reviews.title: A++++++++
customer_reviews.text: Greatest thing EVER. I have a german shep puppy and he was destroying my carpets and rugs. Id pay stanley steamer 100-200 bucks every few months to clean the stains and remove the pet odor from my carpets. Ever since I bought this baby, I don't need to call a carpet cleaning service anymore. It removes stains, it removes odors, it's the best thing I ever bought. It's already paid for itself in a week.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned up old stains
customer_reviews.text: We hadn't shampooed the carpets in years. We decided to invest in a vacuum and got this cleaner to go with it. Great choice! It literally piked up ALL the dirt that was embedded in our carpets for 3 years! They looked brand new after this! I wish I had taken before and after pictures because the difference was day and night! Hoover appliances and soaps are a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much, we bought a bigger bottle!
customer_reviews.text: At first we bought the 32oz version of this cleaner for our, but we loved it so much, we bought this 64oz bottle. This stuff takes out all the gunk off from your carpet and gives out an amazing fresh scent that lasts for a week. Word of advise: If you wash your carpets often, it is best to dilute this solution 70% solution - 30% water in order to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of rentals that $500 cleaning start to add up. I bought this after watch how they worked when hiring people to clean my house. Man, it works wonders, 15 year old carpet looked amazing after this. I use it at home all the time for spot cleaning. When you have small kids, stains are inevitable. I have bad allergy to dog and cats hair, so hopefully this will help me too.
customer_reviews.author: Cbass

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner did a real job on our dirty carpet. Made it cleaner than the expensive service got it six months ago!!! This stuff is fabulous!!! We did do a hot water rinse wash after cleaning to get up all the remaining residue and man, did our carpets look great! Even our office which is right off the back patio - everything gets tracked inside that room!!!! The carpet looked like brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B. Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Def' does the job
customer_reviews.text: Have a new doggy, so there are accidents & messes to clean. Perfect solution for getting the job done, and deodorizes. However, a little dab will do you. Follow instructions for measuring proper amount in carpet cleaner since the solution is concentrated, it can over-foam.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Light, Pleasant Frangrance
customer_reviews.text: I can't be sure if it's the formula or my cleaner but I'm still getting dirt up after multiple cleanings so I know it didn't get everything the first time. Not an overpowering smell like other ones. We have fragrance sensitivities and this one didn't bother us. Before this I had to take an unscented formula and mix it half and half with a scented one to get about the same level of fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Very good for general cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I don’t particularly like the smell of this product, but it isn’t overpowering. So, as long as I rinse the carpet with water a couple of times after using this, it doesn’t bother my allergies. I tried using the carpet cleaning machine with only hot water (as an experiment) and then with this product mixed in. While the machine alone did a mediocre job, adding this product pushed the results into the “very good” range. Even with the machine’s heavy-soil mode, it took several passes to get some blotches out. Pre-treating stains with a spot remover is necessary even with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sibbel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Our dining area is carpeted and we have s one year old that throws everything. Picture says it all. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars !
customer_reviews.text: The scent is nice and makes the place feel clean. The carpet had years that had not been cleaned -the stains on the entrance were grease and dirt from the shoes. More than satisfied with the first session
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great smelling product. Lifts dirt right out of fabric. The only thing I don’t like is how fast this product is used. I got my machine and cleaned my living room,couches,chairs, and two mattresses and it was gone in two days. Maybe I wasn’t cleaning correctly but I’d say I was cleaning to my satisfaction and it was gone pretty fast. But I’d say it’s still worth it considering how easily it lifts stains and dirt. I have cleaned red koolaid out of a cream colored couch so I honestly can’t complain!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...scent is not for me
customer_reviews.text: My carpets look amazing but on the hunt for a different cleaner to use with my Hoover FH50150 Carpet Cleaner. I wasn't in love with the smell of this product. Reminded me of baby powder or Dreft...not my favorite scent but did do a very nice job of getting carpets clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Matherly

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleaning successful
customer_reviews.text: carpet cleaner that has deep cleaning And A wonderful scent... Not to mention that it was so easily use..... What more can a consumer ask for it is done the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm smells so fresh
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my new Hoover carpet cleaner and works really well. The unit I have has a solution tank so it automatically mix with water. It cleans very well and leaves a clean fresh scent but not overpowering. A 64 oz bottle cleans 3 rooms and a hallway plus a small living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jon V. Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this product along with my new, cheap Hoover machine. Rejuvenated carpet. Was getting rid of it. Last chance. $100.00 MACHINE and pet cleaner. Ordered another bottle,since cleaning more in my high traffic shoe wearing, Grandson playing and cat roaming carpet. Really cleans deep and nice light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: This formula belongs in Hogwarts.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I had a very dirty carpet (I'm particularly lazy and busy. Don't judge me). I just added the formula to hot water and Bam magic it was clean. It did not have a strong odor either! There was even many stains on the carpet I just pretreated and scrubbed and then wet vacuumed and gone! This formula belongs in Hogwarts.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: one of the star ratings above asks to rate value for the money. How often does someone buy something that is so much greater than all other products on the market that it is worth a five star rating? There are some, but this is not one of them. I think it cleans just as good as any other brand cleaner, but seems to be reasonably priced on Amazon and it is convenient through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is used alongside the Hoover carpet cleaner I have. It is very close to the original liquid concentrate that came with the cleaner. It works well and lasts just as long. I wasnt a fan of the smell though as this one smelled different from the original hoover liquid that came with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is a little expensive for what it does. It doesn't clean like I hoped it would. I thought my house would smell more fresh after an entire carpet cleaning and it does not. I have cleaned it once or twice a month for the last few months and I still am not impressed. Will be looking at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. L

customer_reviews.title: Great for light dirty carpet, but doesn’t well on heavy dirty carpet
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Hoover Smartwash carpet cleaner with a sample of cleaning solutions a couple of months ago. That solution was used out and I had to look for another one and finally I got this CleanPlus Concentrated Solution. I have to say this one works well for light dirty carpet, but not completely removed heavy dirty in the carpet as I tried three times for my heavy dirty carpet, it definitely remove something, but not all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a home that previously had a cat living in it; unfotunately both of our kids are allergic to cats. So I needed to clean the carpets really well before the furniture arrived. This did the trick! I was amazed at just how dirty the carpets were considering the house was only two years old. We didn't really have any stains to treat, so I'll give it 4 stars since I don't know how well it will treat stains. But no more sneezing and itchy eyes!
customer_reviews.author: KaceyE

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Its interesting that this cleaning solution smells and works better than the solution that came with our carpet cleaner. The "complimentary" solution that came with our Hoover smartwash (best carpet cleaner in the world) was differnt in color, texture, smell. It worked fine. But once we started using this one. I preferred it over the provided solution.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned well
customer_reviews.text: This solution seems to clean pretty well but we did not notice any change in odor. Carpet had never been cleaned before and was several years old so maybe another cleaning is needed for the deodorizer to really kick in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it does an excellent job at cleaning up carpets
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff and this carpet cleaner:, and it does an excellent job at cleaning up carpets. It's good to ventilate the room after to help it all dry out faster. All in all it seems an effective cleaning solution that gets the job done. These kind of vacuums will never be as good as having the carpet professionally steam cleaned, but it does make the carpet cleaner than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Great for do it yourself carpet cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Hoover Clean Plus to clean the carpet in our TV room. It is a very high traffic area, and it has been a while since we had the carpet cleaned. The cleaner did a very good job, I can definitely tell the carpet is much cleaner. The areas that aren’t walked on as much came out really well. There is no soapy smell when the carpet is dried. I would definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good for high traffic areas
customer_reviews.text: This product made my carpet look brand new and looks real clean. It does get out normal wear and high traffic stains. IF you are needing anything MAJOR, I recommend getting a higher concentrated solution for extreme carpet issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells like-new!
customer_reviews.text: The thing i love most about this is the scent. So there isn't much of scent to it, it has that "new" smell and it's very subtle. I hate when cleaners have an overpowering perfume or potpourri scent. I couldn't believe how quick and easy it was to remove pre-treated stains. This stuff really works great!
customer_reviews.author: ten31havoc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use. Easy to Like.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Deep cleans well though I had to go over it twice to root out all the dirt. That was on me as my carpet hadn't been cleaned in a while. Use this. It will make you smile when you look down at the carpet beneath your feet.
customer_reviews.author: JStr8on

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning solution
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleaning solution! I have a pitbull and two cats. This is great for cleaning up accidents from pets. Love the smell It even removed some stains that had been in for a long time that other solutions did not remove!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Calvillo

customer_reviews.title: A power house of a cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my mom's dog pee stained carpet and it took the smell and stains out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen W.

customer_reviews.title: For Once Something That REALLY Works
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were actually stunned when we pulled the cleaning machine across the rug. Had no idea it had become so soiled and this, along with the rented rug cleaning machine brought it back to looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: Fastboat

customer_reviews.title: it really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought it together with the machine and it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not concentrated solution
customer_reviews.text: What is called by concentrated. ??? It is so watery and could not help me to clean a simple stain on my car seat. I pour like four time more than the suggestion amount to clean a coffee stain off my car seat. Did not work well. It is not that concentrated
customer_reviews.author: Phat Dang

customer_reviews.title: Proves Itself Every Time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. It is astonishing how much dirt and grime it removes. Start with clear water, add this soap, shampoo the carpet, the water sucked back up is a dark brown. It’s gross. But, that shows me just how well this works.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Terry

customer_reviews.title: Made a big dent in a grease stain
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about it working, but it gave my poor old beat up couch a bit of a lift, and yes, it almost removed a couple of grime/grease stains on the chair arms. There was this one mystery stain in an odd place that didn't seem to budge, so I chalked it up to being an alien implant and continued cleaning around it. When I run out of this product, I will reorder it.
customer_reviews.author: rebeccawscc

customer_reviews.title: Very weak stuff. Better off using regular soap.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst cleaning product I've ever used. It's like trying to clean with plain water. Will never use a Hoover product again. It's expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in LA

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used with my carpet cleaner and my house smelled better and my allergies improved a lot from getting rid of dust in the carpet that the vacuum cleaner pick up fully.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a carpet that's over 20 years old in a room that's never used and it removed dirt embedded deeply easily using the Hoover carpet cleaning machine. It shocked me. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the Hoover PowerDash Pet carpet cleaner machine and the results were beyond amazing. Before, my 15 year old living room carpet was ridiculously disgusting. After using the concentrate with the machine, it looks brand new. No kidding. I’ve been in shock ever since haha. And a little of the solution goes a long way. I only had to use a very small portion of the bottle. Definitely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I used it on a carpet where I have multiple dogs. It cleaned well and took some of the scent out but not all of it. Granted it’s not the soaps fault I would recommend it to anyone it doesn’t smell over perfumed.
customer_reviews.author: MIKI D

customer_reviews.title: Staple product for my home
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in Hoover carpet cleaner. Scent is not too strong or sweet. It works great for me, a person with allergies! I'm sensitive to a lot perfumes.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great Companion for your Steam Vaccum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great companion for your steam vacuum, it is a concentrated solution so you do need to mix it with water if your vacuum doesn't do it automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Quality carpet cleaning solution
customer_reviews.text: The Carpet cleaning solution does a great job cleaning the carpets. It even got some stains out. Easy to use and left the carpet looking and feeling fresh
customer_reviews.author: Cantrech23

customer_reviews.title: We have the cleanest , freshest smelling house with Hoover carpet shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! We have 3 very large dogs and carpeting. This product removes odors and leaves not only remarkably clean carpets but leaves a.fresh, clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn

customer_reviews.title: Carpets are left with a clean fresh scent.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, smells great and really does a good job deep cleaning the carpets. Your carpets are left with a clean fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: A good clean for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other products that are more money this by far is the best carpet cleaner and if you have a shampooer with a rinse option it's even better so you have no soapy residue left over when the carpet dries and really does clean well
customer_reviews.author: AZGuy86

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for the bottle size. It was $4 cheaper for me then buying the target brand carpet cleaner. Same size bottle also. Cleans great. And smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Has a Nice Scent
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job on dog-wrecked carpets. It has a nice fresh scent and doesn't leave a sticky feeling afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Enke Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely clean smell
customer_reviews.text: These stuff cleans & smells so good I'm buying a case!! The carpet kept the smell for at least a week & I have dogs
customer_reviews.author: Rex Barker Ledon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions on the bottle and my carpet STILL smells like dog urine. I even doubled the concentration and NOTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It defeated renters
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 scrubbings and 3 rinsings to get out 3 years of foot traffic stain but it looks great now! This was done after a professional cleaner tried to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner has done a great job on my carpets without leaving any soapy residue that would attract more dirt. It has a pleasant smell too- not overpowering, just fresh. Definitely has made my carpet look fresh and new again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it the second time. I always use this to wash the carpet. It's very clean. It's just a little slippery after washing
customer_reviews.author: tian

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well with the right machine
customer_reviews.text: It may be low on the amount of bubbles but I believe it provided enough cleaning power in the washing process
customer_reviews.author: A. Gnc

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product did a nice job of cleaning the rug. Not sure if it is the best for the price since I don't do it that often. I trusted that Hoover cleaning solution would work in a Hoover Carpet Washer.
customer_reviews.author: Upstateny

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpet Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shampoo for your carpet cleaner and I love the feel and freshness of our carpet after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Haar

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was only ordering the Hoover cleaning product but was PLEASANTLY surprised when I saw I order their "plus" product. Not sure the difference but definitely did the job. Thank you to my new Hoover family. You got a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Orlinsky

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning is very clean.. The smell is also very fragrant. I have a baby at home, and it has no smell when used. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works well, only reason for missing star... the scent could be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael McCartney

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL FOR CLEANING CARPET
customer_reviews.text: Have used it in a couple of different Hoover carpet cleaners and it works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: SOUTHLAKE MAMA

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing. We use it with our carpet cleaning and have found it very effective even with tough stains.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This solution worked well in my Hoover steam cleaner. It, along with my attachment for scrubbing specific spots, mostly removed our stains...there are still faint remains..but that is not surprising since the stains weren't fresh.
customer_reviews.author: M. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Not good for stains
customer_reviews.text: This was not very effective for removing stains on carpet though overall cleaning was good. Personally did not care for scent, I don't think it really smelled like clean linen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do It Yourself and save.
customer_reviews.text: My carpets and rugs cleaned up well... looks professional. I purchased the machine and the solution for what it would have cost to have professional cleaned one time. I'm excited to be able to clean up traffic areas any time in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Us
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleaner I like to use in my shampooer. It does a great job of cleaning the carpet (the machine helps a lot too...lol). I wish it were carried in more stores!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet stains
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my new carpet cleaner. We were thinking of replacing our carpet with wood floors this spring. This product worked so well that we are keeping the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: After using Hoover carpet cleaner, it cleans so good. It also got up slot of stains. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Florinda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Dilute
customer_reviews.text: Use 1 oz to 15 oz of softened water, otherwise it take several rinses to remove from the carpet. Even so, it leaves the carpet stiffer than when I started.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning, poor fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning but the "fresh linen" scent smells bad, probably because it isn't strong enough to cover the smell of the cleaning chemicals. I've used several products with great "fresh linen" fragrances; this isn't one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Nall

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Have used other cleaning products and while they mostly got the stains you could still tell where my dog had puked or someone had spilled something, this helps my carpet look good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Raul Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Carpet and Smells Fresh!!!
customer_reviews.text: Carpet cleaner lifts dirt from the carpet and smells fresh. If you have carpet stains, treat the stained carpet with stain remover before using this solution to steam clean your carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good. But sometimes you have to apply directly on the stain. Some stains are not completely removed . Better to use as soon as stain happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo rabbit

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with the Hoover carpet cleaner..not sure about other models.
customer_reviews.author: Phil77

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for pet owners carpet
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good buy. Pros: very easy to use with the Hoover carpet cleaner Does a good job getting up the dirt Very good on pet stains! Con: I feel like my carpets get dirtier sooner
customer_reviews.author: Chloe F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used this concentrated cleaner and it did magic!! The vacuum I used had it’s own cleaner and wouldn’t touch the stains. This one did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: ... clean it again it also did not leave a bad smell when you cleaned it like some other carpet ...
customer_reviews.text: It did wonders on spots that were heavy in my carpet i would order more when i have to clean it again it also did not leave a bad smell when you cleaned it like some other carpet cleaner do
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa frasier

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with Hoover Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and cleans very well. I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: I just love this product it works well with my house hold. I have two big dogs. You can feel the clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for houses with kids...
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning white carpets and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Appu

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and easy to use. Also great price. Cleans well
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good product that removes stains and dirt in my carpet
customer_reviews.text: Good product that removes stains and dirt in my carpet. Every couple of month ill shampoo my carpets to remove and dirt that the vacuum cannot pick up. This solution in gentle enough for different carpets yet strong enough to clean dirt away.
customer_reviews.author: jzun223

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if you have the hoover cleaner you'll need cleaner as you'll use a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. I highly recommend it. Use use use with the hoover vaccum. You'll love the hoover deep cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Windle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used this cleaner on my carpets twice. I had to order more, since the smaller size doesn't last too long.

customer_reviews.title: Much better products out there!
customer_reviews.text: No detectable scent (I’d prefer a fresh scent). It didn’t clean well - hard to believe this is “concentrated” solution!
customer_reviews.author: SiSoyYo

customer_reviews.title: Don't feel like it really work
customer_reviews.text: The price is high enough, so I was sure that it helps me to clean two big carpets. However, I was extremely disappointed with the result. I tried to use more product to make carpets become clean enough, but it doesn't work as expected. I will not buy this next time. Try to find better one. This does not clean ideally.
customer_reviews.author: Artem Chernenko

customer_reviews.title: The very best
customer_reviews.text: Really works. I had a stain in my hallway that no professional carpet cleaner could clean, But this stuff works. I did shampoo the spot twice a week apart. Stain gone.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works wonders! Check out the photo of before (toddler stained food messes on carpet) and the after. Truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Glover

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light smell
customer_reviews.text: This product has improved since I purchased it several years ago. Not as sudsy on carpet. Great new light smell. Used to have a strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: Leonidas

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Hoover Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It does not need extra foam suppression chemicals like the rentals of yesteryear, does well with pet stains and on stone, too.
customer_reviews.author: leventino

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST CARPET CLEANER IVE EVER USED!!!! this completely transformed my rugs, dog beds, furniture etc!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer regester

customer_reviews.title: good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: smells great, I do have a hoover, so works great in my machine. Always pick up one when on a good sale.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased so far and it leaves a pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: Just used for the first time and I’m very impressed so far. Leaves a nice smell and seems to have done a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. MccAin

customer_reviews.title: OXY CLEAN WORKS BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Does not work even at full strength , a solution of oxy clean works better and is much less expense, would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: C.F.V.

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING and works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the way this carpet cleaner smells and the amazing job it does on our stained carpets and upholstery. We received a sample bottle with the carpet cleaner that we bought and was so disappointed when it was empty.
customer_reviews.author: sjeggers

customer_reviews.title: Works so well, it makes you want to keep cleaning your carpets
customer_reviews.text: Bought a carpet cleaner on QVC and this was recommended, works great. We had a 15 Y/O 80# Lab/Akita mix. She had some accidents and this cleaner worked like magic. The scent of the cleaner is very pleasant and does a deep cleaning of the carpets. You won't be sorry for trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used this with my new Hoover carpet cleaner and am impressed. It works one bottle goes further than you think. Easy to work with and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for lying to us, Hoover! This product is NOT non-toxic.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for misleading your consumers, Hoover. I ordered this because I am pregnant and in need of a non-toxic carpet cleaner, as the bottle advertised on this Amazon listing is clearly labeled. The label on the bottle I received has “non-toxic” removed from its label and is only labeled as phosphate-free. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. T.

product_meta.title: Hoover AH30330NF CleanPlus Concentrated Solution Formula Carpet Cleaner and Deodorizer, 64 Oz, Red
product_meta.description: This detergent deep cleans and quickly removes stubborn everyday dirt and grime. It's ideal for use in high traffic areas.
feature_bullets: Concentrated powerful detergent solution for everyday stains, odors, dirt and grime on carpets, area rugs, upholstery, and car interiors
Use with a Hoover PreTreat Spray to ensure Best results and continue to use it as part of a regular maintenance program to extend the life of Your carpets
Safe for use in leading spot and Full size deep cleaning machines, including Hoover, Bissell, and Rug Doctor, when used as directed
Phosphate free, non-toxic and septic safe; Made in the U.S.A
